innovation.title: AZURE. INVENT WITH PURPOSE.
innovation.heading: AI-powered innovation—accelerated with Azure
innovation.text: Started building AI solutions using the latest models and your favorite Azure tools. Pay-as-you-go or try Azure free for up to 30 days. There's no upfront commitment-cancel anytime.

hybridData.title: Microsoft Build—register now for May 23–25
hybridData.text: Broaden your knowledge and advance your skills with deep, interactive sessions for developers.

hybridData.title: Build innovative AI solutions
hybridData.text: Access sophisticated vision, speech, language, and decision-making AI models and create your own machine learning models.

hybridData.title: Achieve more with Azure
hybridData.text: Migrate your infrastructure, apps, and data to the cloud—and access tools, resources, and expertise to help you modernize your apps and get the most out of your cloud investments.

productsAndServices.text: Apply advanced coding and language models to a variety of use cases.
Migrate and modernize with managed Azure SQL cloud databases.
Use AI to analyze content in images and video.
Use an enterprise-grade service for the end-to-end machine learning lifecycle.
Simplify migration and modernization with a unified platform.
Protect multicloud and hybrid environments with integrated security from code to cloud.

azureCustomers.text: The NBA used Azure to deliver innovative experiences that keep fans engaged and help referees make consistent calls across all games
H&R Block optimizes the tax return process using Azure AI and Azure Machine Learning to quickly digitize data from forms
North Umbria Healthcare NHS Foundation Trust is helping doctors turn data into medical insights with Azure Machine Learning and the Responsible AI Dashboard
Fujitsu increased efficiency and reduced costs by migrating its on-premises datacenters to Azure and by modernizing with a cloud-first strategy
Turn 10 Studios created a turbocharged gaming architecture for Forza Horizon 5 using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and other Azure services

accelarationMigration.text: Accelerate your migration and modernization with Azure
